result.title: ICPC 2018 Registrations
result.content:
Hi everyone,
Every year, the Programming Club does registrations for all the IIIT-H ICPC teams, and will continue doing the same this year.
There are five regionals in ICPC 2018, and a team can participate in at-most two of them. For more info, check the codechef ICPC page

All those interested in participating, please follow the following instructions:

  1. Go to the ICPC Baylor site, and register using your IIIT email id.
  2. Form a team of exactly three members.
  3. Have a look at the regionals information on codechef: here
  4. Pick the regionals you wish to participate in, and fill the following form: registration form
    NOTE: Do NOT make a team on Baylor. Teams will be made by the coach.
IMPORTANT: Please do not pay till we confirm your team. There can be clashes in team names, in which case, team names must be changed. Only make the payments after your team appears on Baylor. If you have any queries, please ask before doing anything. We cannot help recover money paid through an erroneous transfer.

UPDATE (29/07 23:00) Teams who have filled the form by 29th have been registered on Baylor. Please proceed to make the payment for the respective sites.

UPDATE Payment details are listed below.

Amrita

Amount: Rs. 500
After qualifying: Rs. 3000
Available Methods: NEFT, cash
Check the payment details here
Teams can also pay the amount (Rs. 500) directly to a member of the registrations team (see list below)

Hindustan/Chennai

Amount: Rs. 500
After qualifying: Rs. 3250
Available Methods: NEFT, cash
Check the payment details here

Kharagpur

Amount: Rs. 500
After qualifying: Rs. 3000
Available Methods: NEFT, cash
Check the payment details here (scroll down, and click on "Registration" on the right side)

Kolkata-Kanpur

Amount: Rs. 3500 (Rs. 2750 will be refunded if team does not qualify for on-site)
After Qualifying: N/A
Available Methods: DD
Check the payment details here
Printable form link â€” You must fill this form, and submit.
NOTE Teams have to print the form given in the above website, and submit it after filling in the details. We will get the signatures from the respective authorities, and post the forms.

Gwalior

Amount: Rs. 750
After qualifying: Rs. 2500
Available Methods: NEFT, cash
Check the payment details here

UPDATE (30/8): Once you have finished the payment (either NEFT, or gave cash to a member listed below), fill this google form

Registration Team: for collecting registration fee

You can pay the registration fee to one of us:

  • OBH Main: Anurudh Reddy (OBH D314), Rishabh Arora (OBH D5)
  • OBH D block: Arjun P (OBH D303)
  • OBH E block: Additya Popli (OBH E12)
  • Bakul: Anurudh Reddy (OBH D314)
  • GH: Soumya Vadlamannati (new GH A204)

Note: Alternatively, you can do the NEFT yourself, following the instructions on the respective websites.

NOTE: Deadline for making payments is: 10th October for NEFT/cash, and 8th October for DD.

--
Programming Club Coordinators
